website_summaries.verdict: Clean and crisply designed with quality craftsmanship one would expect from this brand.
pros: One of the smaller options in the brand's product line, that doesn't skimp on the details
We love the textured band and touches of quartz that that power the watch
A watch for those who appreciate a clean look and an accessory that won't overpower a look
cons: Some customers note the watch's face will easily fog

customer_reviews.title: Fits great for a petite wrist.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! If you are petite like me you know it’s so hard to find a watch that isn’t too big for your wrist. This was perfect! The colors flow together so smoothly making this watch a classic.
customer_reviews.author: Jangles

customer_reviews.title: This watch makes me happy
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. Such a clean, simple design. The wrist band has darkened just a little over time, giving the leather a slightly smoother sheen. But I don't mind. It looks great and is quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Carsey

customer_reviews.title: nice design but glass not good
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch but glass on face is poor quality, It either came scratched or got scratched in 1 day not made out of the nice glass other watches this price range have.
customer_reviews.author: abracadabraca

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully unique
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch but the face isn’t as but as I would have hoped. Still lovely though.
customer_reviews.author: christie burns

customer_reviews.title: Leather band is damaged and defective upon receipt
customer_reviews.text: Upon taking the watch from its box, it was clear I wouldn’t even be able to try on the item. The leather band is defective- it will not unfold so to speak and just attempting to lay it flat shows the damage already apparent as seen in the leather being puckered and wrinkled. I’m really disappointed because I love the watch but I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small face
customer_reviews.text: Watch face was MUCH smaller than it appears in the photos. Extremely disappointed. I love a big chunky watch and this was not it at all. I even put it on my 9 year olds wrist, and couldn’t get it to look as big as it does on the model.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Expect smaller face
customer_reviews.text: Love it, good quality. My only issue that the watch face is significantly smaller than what the pictures make it seem like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best watch ever!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS WATCH. so so cute ! It matches my wedding ring perfectly and is so easy to open and close and easy to adjust the size !
customer_reviews.author: Emak

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of the watch but getting it fastened was a bit of a headache in the beginning! Now that’s it’s been fastened a few times, it’s not as difficult
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Elegant!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the MVMT analog watch I gave her for her birthday! It looked great on the web page with its gray face, bronze highlights and mesh band but it looks absolutely elegant on her wrist! The photo underestimates how lovely a watch this is.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C SLC

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is sleek and elegant looking. I absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.author: HMc

customer_reviews.title: It 's Looks
customer_reviews.text: It is very pretty, the rose color case is stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Don Shiloff

customer_reviews.title: A very Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: This timepiece is beautiful, useful, and stylish at a lovely afforable price. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Quality is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The Quality of this watch is amazing! I love the fact that the design is very simple and the color will go with any outfit. The price of this watch is a steal for how good quality watch you receive.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gosnell

product_meta.title: MVMT MOD Watches | 32MM Women's Analog Minimalist Watch
product_meta.description:

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars46 ratings
feature_bullets: ESSENCE OF DESIGN- Inspired by the clean lines and perfect geometry of minimalist architecture with a smaller 32 MM diameter case
SIMPLE + RELIABLE MOVEMENT- Battery powered 2 hand Miyota Quartz movement

DURABLE AND WATER RESISTANT- Weatherproof up to 5 ATM/50 Meters. Perfect for carefree everyday use and can withstand a breif submersion under water, but should not be taken swimming or bathing. Glass case made of hardened mineral crystal for enhanced durability
DESIGNED IN THE USA- Premium on-trend Watches and accessories, designed at our headquarters in Los Angeles.
TWO YEAR GUARANTEE- We’re so confident you’ll love what we do that we offer a two-year guarantee on everything we make
